Root System Generator Spatial¶

Root System Library

A library of methods relating to spatial properties of synthetic root system generation.

root_system_lib.spatial.get_x_rotation_matrix(theta: float) → ndarray[source]¶

Construct a rotation matrix for the x axis.

thetafloat

The rotation angle in degrees.

rotate(4, 4) float

The x rotation matrix.

root_system_lib.spatial.get_y_rotation_matrix(theta: float) → ndarray[source]¶

Construct a rotation matrix for the y axis.

thetafloat

The rotation angle in degrees.

rotate(4, 4) float

The y rotation matrix.

root_system_lib.spatial.get_z_rotation_matrix(theta: float) → ndarray[source]¶

Construct a rotation matrix for the z axis.

thetafloat

The rotation angle in degrees.

rotate(4, 4) float

The z rotation matrix.

root_system_lib.spatial.make_homogenous(matrix: array) → ndarray[source]¶

Adds an additional ‘W’ dimension of ones to the matrix. Performs a conversion from Cartesian coordinates to homogenous coordinates.

matrix: (n, d) float

The matrix with Cartesian coordinates.

homogenous(n, d + 1) float

The homogenous matrix.

root_system_lib.spatial.transform(roll=0, pitch=0, yaw=0, translation=[0, 0, 0], reflect=[1, 1, 1, 1], scale=[1, 1, 1, 1])[source]¶

Updates the transformation matrix.

roll: int

Rotation about the x-axis in degrees.

pitch: int

Rotation about the y-axis in degrees.

yaw: int

Rotation about the z-axis in degrees.

translation: (3,) float

Translation matrix.

reflect: (4,) float

Reflection matrix.

scale: (4,) float

Scaling matrix.

scale: (4, 4) float

Transformation matrix.
